data.title: User:Ibjaja055
data.text:
Hello! My name is Muib Shefiu and this is my user page. I am a free knowledge advocate and I am very passionate aboout it. I am an English language teacher and I do use Wikipedia to aid the teaching and learning process. I also enjoyed creating new contents on the English Wikipedia to the extent that I think I am addicted to it.

User Groups

Wikimedia Nigeria User Group Nigeria (member)

Wikipedia & Education User Group (Member)

Wikimedia User Group Nigeria,

Wikimedians for Sustainable Development

GLAM-Wiki

African Wikipedian Alliance

EduWiki Nigeria

Newsletters published

Introducing Wiki Loves AFrodemics Campaign

Wikimedia Promotions in Federal University of Kashere; A Dream Comes True for the Participants.

WikiForHumanRights in Nigeria 2024 Campaign Virtual Launch

Muib Shefiu actively participates in both the Community Organising Campaign and editing process of the Wikimedia Foundation projects. He has over twenty thousand edits across the Wikimedia Foundation Projects with 60 percent of the edits from the English Wikipedia where he has created over 240 articles. As a campaign organiser, he has directly taught over 1000 editors across different projects and programmes.
